mapper.update: update rent_reserve set cancel=#{c} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from rent_member right join (select cancel,rent_reserve.no as rno,mno,cname,start_day,end_day as end_day from rent_reserve left join rent_car on rent_reserve.cno = rent_car.no) tmp on tmp.mno = rent_member.no where end_day >= sysdate and (name like #{key} or cname like #{key} or id like #{key}) and cancel=1 order by start_day desc

select * from rent_member right join (select cancel,rent_reserve.no as rno,mno,cname,start_day,end_day as end_day from rent_reserve left join rent_car on rent_reserve.cno = rent_car.no) tmp on tmp.mno = rent_member.no where end_day >= sysdate and (name like #{key} or cname like #{key} or id like #{key})and cancel=0 order by start_day desc

select * from rent_member right join (select cancel,rent_reserve.no as rno,mno,cname,start_day,end_day from rent_reserve left join rent_car on rent_reserve.cno = rent_car.no) tmp on tmp.mno = rent_member.no where (end_day < sysdate or cancel=3) and (name like #{key} or cname like #{key} or id like #{key}) order by end_day desc

select cancel,to_char(start_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_day,to_char(end_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_day from rent_reserve where ((start_day <= to_date(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD') and end_day >= to_date(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD'))or(start_day <= to_date(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD') and end_day >= to_date(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD')) or (start_day between to_date(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD')) or (end_day between to_date(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD'))) and cno=#{no} and cancel!=3 order by start_day asc

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.A_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAY FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE (#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS A_DATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE (#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE (#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) A JOIN ( SELECT TO_DATE (#{START_DAY},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS B_DATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE (#{END_DAY},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE (#{START_DAY},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) B ON A.A_DATE = B.B_DATE

select * from rent_member left join (select * from rent_reserve left join rent_car on rent_reserve.cno = rent_car.no where mno = #{no } ) tmp on tmp.mno = rent_member.no where mno = #{no } order by start_day asc

select cname,rent_reserve.no,to_char(start_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') as sday, to_char(end_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') as eday from rent_reserve left join rent_car on rent_reserve.cno = rent_car.no where mno = #{no } and end_day >= sysdate and cancel=0 order by sday asc

select cancel,cname,rent_reserve.no,to_char(start_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') as sday, to_char(end_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') as eday from rent_reserve left join rent_car on rent_reserve.cno = rent_car.no where mno = #{no } and (end_day < sysdate or cancel=3) order by eday desc

select cname,rent_reserve.no,to_char(start_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') as sday, to_char(end_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') as eday from rent_reserve left join rent_car on rent_reserve.cno = rent_car.no where mno = #{no } and end_day >= sysdate and cancel=1 order by sday asc
